text:
Netra | Full-Time | Boston | REMOTE | http://netra.io

We are a deep-learning startup gathering insight into how our clients' customers view and interact with their products.

Currently, we are hard at work creating an application that augments visual search with an online catalog allowing users to intuitively navigate the collection based on visual similarity.

Our hiring process does not require intense vetting or half-day interview sessions, just come work with us for a few weeks and we'll figure things out from there!

We're looking to expand our team so if you're a

* [Machine Vision Scientist](http://pastebin.com/raw/JM2kAVKn) (Open CV, OpenCL)

* [Full Stack Web Developer](http://pastebin.com/raw/VZNh4ZEj) (Angular, PostgreSQL, Solr)

* [Customer Success Manager](http://pastebin.com/raw/w1ZQF2m4)

We would love to have you on board!

Contact us at jobs@netra.io
